1: -module(my_SUITE).
    2: -compile(export_all).
    3: 
    4: all() -> [first_test].
    5: 
    6: init_per_suite(Config) ->
    7:     {ok, P} = gen_server:start(simple, go, []),
    8:     [{server, P} | Config].
    9: 
   10: first_test(Config) ->
   11:     P = proplists:get_value(server, Config),
   12:     V1 = gen_server:call(P, val),
   13:     V2 = gen_server:call(P, val),
   14:     V2 =:= V1.
